Module gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core
Package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic

Interface IAtomicValuedItem

All Superinterfaces:
ICollectionValue, IItem
All Known Subinterfaces:
IAnyAtomicItem, IAnyUriItem, IBase64BinaryItem, IBooleanItem, IDateItem, IDateTimeItem, IDayTimeDurationItem, IDecimalItem, IDurationItem, IEmailAddressItem, IFeatureNoDataAtomicValuedItem, IFieldNodeItem, IFlagNodeItem, IHostnameItem, IIntegerItem, IIPAddressItem, IIPv4AddressItem, IIPv6AddressItem, IMarkupItem, INcNameItem, INonNegativeIntegerItem, INumericItem, IPositiveIntegerItem, IStringItem, ITemporalItem, ITokenItem, IUntypedAtomicItem, IUriReferenceItem, IUuidItem, IYearMonthDurationItem
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractAnyAtomicItem, AbstractDateItem, AbstractDateTimeItem, AbstractDecimalItem, AbstractIntegerItem, AbstractStringItem, AbstractTemporalItem, AbstractUntypedAtomicItem, AbstractUriItem
public interface IAtomicValuedItem extends IItem
This marker interface identifies a valued IItem type that has an associated IAnyAtomicItem value.

    Get the atomic value for the item.

  • Method Details

    • toAtomicItem

      IAnyAtomicItem toAtomicItem()
      Get the atomic value for the item. This may be the same item if the item is an instance of IAnyAtomicItem.
      Returns:
      the atomic value or null if the item has no available value
